title: Jihn, "Captive Audience " needs Wider AOE range
body:
Heres why:

*enemies with min 300 movement speed can walk right out of it
* you need two or more to actually hit someone single target wise if not distracted
* INcrease Slow Zone or Increase Damage for balance implications

replies.body:
You'll notice that enemies that walk into it immediately get the icon that indicates your W can snare them BEFORE they take damage.

Your combo is either to have an ally distract or crowd control them, or to scare them in the zone of effect yourself. It's not supposed to be a guaranteed hit by itself.
